Plot: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.
Title: Black Death
Actors: Sean Bean, Eddie Redmayne, John Lynch, Tim McInnerny
tomatoConsensus: Black Death delivers the fire and brimstone violence its subject matter warrants, while posing some interesting questions of faith and religion.
